#### Overview
Alivia Cochran is a Ph.D. Candidate in the Economics Department at the University of Wyoming. She applies microeconomic theory and causal inference methods to examine how energy investments are impacted by changes in policies and prices.

#### Research Interests
- Energy Economics
- Environmental Economics
- Applied Microeconomic Theory
- Applied Economics
